newsitem.title: UK: MOTOR RACING-SCHUMACHER JUNIOR SET TO JOIN JORDAN.
newsitem.headline: MOTOR RACING-SCHUMACHER JUNIOR SET TO JOIN JORDAN.

text.p: Ralf Schumacher, younger brother of Germany's double world champion Michael, is expected to sign a two-year contract with British team Jordan Peugeot on Friday.
The Silverstone-based outfit have called a news conference with Schumacher set to be announced as one of their drivers for next season.
The 21-year-old would be following in the footsteps of his illustrious brother, who made his Grand Prix debut with Jordan in 1991, but switched to Benetton after just one race.
